room.name: Testland, Bonfire Land
room.desc: There's lots of scenery here, varied and wild. But none of that matters because there's a huge bonfire which draws all attention!
room.focus: You don't know why, but you feel like whooping.

room.name: Testland, Ice Cavern
room.desc: It's cold, and its windy, which adds to the wind chill factor. The wind seems to be coming from the northwest.

room.name: Testland, Wind Tunnel
room.desc: You suddenly find yourself next to a huge vortex of wind and leaves!

room.name: Testland, Ancient Oak Tree
room.desc: A grand, ancient oak tree stands here, as it has done for centuries.
room.focus: Its big. Very big. Oh, and at the base of the tree you see a bronze door that leads inside (try OPEN ENTER!).

room.name: Testland, Inside Oak
room.desc: The great tree is hollowed out, and the inside reveals that many generations of elves have lived here, making cookies for children everywhere. There also appears be a great bronze door.
room.focus: It probably leads outside, if you LEAVE, assuming its open
